name: The Serpent Cycle
description:
A GGJ 2017 interactive poem game telling the story of Jormungandr and Ragnarok.

---

Explore the story of the Jormungandr and Ragnarok by moving an interactive stone world. Click and hold the parts of the world and find where they should come to rest. Make oceans become clouds, see the serpent emerge, clouds create rain and the oceans rise again.

Input: Mouse / Cursor

How To Play:

1) Click on a part of the world to activate it

2) Hold your click until you find it's final place or it finds one itself

3) Observe the story of Ragnarok.
